name: ColdGun California
description:
Currently in pre-pre-pre-alpha stage.

I do plan to make this an app that can be installed, and maybe release on Steam, but I highly doubt it, it will likely stay here.

CONTROLS

  • WASD to move
  • E to parry
  • Space to roll
  • R to reload
  • 1 for pistol
  • 2 for shotguns
  • 3 for AR

I haven't added respawning yet so just refresh the page LOL
